descriptionParagraphs: Contextual add-ins are Outlook add-ins that activate based on text in a message or appointment. By using contextual add-ins, a user can initiate tasks related to a message without leaving the message itself, which results in an easier and richer user experience.

detailItemCategories.name: Samples
detailItemCategories.description: Possible html supported text shown just above the list of links

items.name: Outlook Add-In Contextual Regex
items.description: This sample add-in demonstrates how to create a contextual add-in that activates when a regular expression match is detected in the body of a message.
